metadata.name: Solis
metadata.description:
While sunrise over Mediterranean Sea the light was playing hide and seek with shadows!

Artist       : Erdem Kuybulu
Edition    : 1/1
Location : Alanya / Turkey
Year         : 2021
Camera  : Olympus OM-D E5 MarkIII
EXIF         : 40 sec @ f/20 ISO 400
Size         : 3740 x 4675  300 dpi

License  : Extended Editorial
Can be used to display privately, in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants. The License includes unlimited use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works. Copyright, IP rights, and reproduction rights of the NFT remain with the creator/artist.
